cardPackage.description: Enjoy a full service bank account with the Flexi Value Bundle, which includes a funeral benefit.

bulletPoints: Bundle of transactions at a monthly fee of R65.00
Access to Absa Online, mobile and telephone banking
Unlimited internal debit and stop orders
Unlimited NotifyMe SMS or email notifications
24/7 access to the largest ATM network in South Africa
Switch your debit orders for free
Use CashSend to send money to anyone without a bank account
Join Absa Rewards and earn cash back when you swipe your card.
Option to apply for an overdraft facility (subject to credit assessment)
Option to apply for an ATM Instant Loan (subject to credit assessment).
